title: Catching crocodiles
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Carpentaria, Gulf of, Region (N.T. and Qld.)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural history
Places/Carpentaria, Gulf of, Region (N.T. and Qld.)
description: This film, showing aspects of the life of crocodile hunters on the Gulf of Carpentaria, was one of eleven short Australian educational films produced by Efftee Studios as a result of a partnership between naturalist Noel Monkman and Frank Thring Snr. Monkman photographed and directed the films and Frank Thring Snr narrated most of them. Two series were produced: the "Barrier Reef" series which consisted of five films and the "Australian Marvelogue" series, of which "Catching Crocodiles" is one of six. Suitable for secondary school level.
